Skip to Main Content Home 
Festivals & Events

Festivals & Events

Slip on your favorite dancing shoes and get ready for fun! Treat your taste buds, celebrate your heritage, and make the most of your weekends. From magical starry nights at summer reggae concerts to lively bluegrass jams, crawfish-eating contests, family camping trips, and scenic 5K trail runs, there’s something for everyone. With a year packed full of festivals and events in your county parks, the possibilities for fun are endless. Come out and explore all the ways you can live life to the fullest!

Skip to Main Content 
871 Riverland Dr.Charleston, SC 29412
843-795-4386 Email Directions Make Your Reservation Now Rules & Regulations Cottages Photo Gallery Home Our Parks Camping & Lodging 
The Cottages

The Cottages at James Island County Park

Enjoy the natural beauty of James Island County Park, with year-round fun for the entire family. Just a short drive from downtown Charleston, the 643-acre park offers an abundance of exceptional recreation offerings and natural beauty.
Check availability and make reservations now... Rates & Reservations Cottage Features Park Amenities 
Cottage Rates
There is a two-night minimum stay any other time. There is a six-night minimum stay between Memorial Day and Labor Day, Tuesday to Monday. Standard Rate 
$219 Sunday-Thursday

$269 Friday & Saturday

During Holiday Festival of Lights

is held two Fridays before Thanksgiving - December 31.
Holiday Festival of Lights 
$229 Sunday-Thursday

$279 Friday & Saturday

Add 14% Accommodations Tax to all rates.
Add $5 non-refundable transaction/reservation fee. Limit of eight people per cottage overnight, no more than 15 people allowed. 
Cottage Reservations

or call 843-795-4386. Reservations cannot be made through email. Reservations are recommended and may be made up to one year prior to your arrival date. Full payment is due at the time the reservation is made. For more information, .
Make your reservation online view all cottage guidelines 
Cancellations

Cancellations made 15 or more days in advance will incur a one-night cancellation fee. Cancellations made 14 or less days in advance will incur a 50% cancellation fee.
Can I view photos of the camp sites? What does full hook-up include? Is cable available in the campground or cottages? Are golf carts allowed in the park? How late can I check-in? View All
